children.markdown:
[![](https://i1.wp.com/photos10.flickr.com/15354907_e537b6016f.jpg?w=960)](http://www.flickr.com/photos/adders/15354907/ "photo sharing") [Edinburgh Police Box](http://www.flickr.com/photos/adders/15354907/), originally uploaded by [Adam Tinworth](http://www.flickr.com/people/adders/).
*Dr Who* may be back on our tellies after a 15 year hiatus, but the police box has never left the streets of Scotland. Did you know that Edinburgh Council even has [guidelines for maintaining them](http://download.edinburgh.gov.uk/DQ_Guidelines/Police_Boxes.pdf)? Technorati Tags: [policebox](http://technorati.com/tag/policebox), [tardis](http://technorati.com/tag/tardis), [streetfurniture](http://technorati.com/tag/streetfurniture), [urbandesign](http://technorati.com/tag/urbandesign), [edinburgh](http://technorati.com/tag/edinburgh), [property](http://technorati.com/tag/property)
